item.title: Setup Docker in Wsl
item.author: krisfrajer@gmail.com (krisfrajer)
item.description: Installing Docker in Windows Subsystem Linux (WSL) NOTES After ssummer 2020, you need to have WSL2 which is made available for Windows 10 Home edition It is recommended to upgrade to Windows 10 Pro In “Turn Windows features on and off”, check “Windows Hypervisor Platform” To be confirmed, check “Hyper-V”? Currently working but this is not checked. To investigate… Finally, install “Docker Destop” and ensure the docker-machine is up and running.
